content:
Hello Everyone,

Please join us today for our monthly NHUG meeting at 1 pm MT.

In this month's meeting, we will hear about two featured projects:
Dr. Rajesh Kumar will discuss running air quality models (WRF-Chem, WRF-LES) on Derecho, in support of Paris Olympics games. Dr. Peter Blossey and Sami Turbeville will share their experience running the Simple Cloud-Resolving E3SM Atmosphere Model (SCREAM) on Derecho.

Please join us using the Zoom meeting details below:
Join Zoom Meeting
https://ucar-edu.zoom.us/j/99404339583

Meeting ID: 994 0433 9583
Passcode: NHUG2024

Please share this invitation with any colleagues who may be interested.
We look forward to seeing you there!
Negin
